messages.title: WE'RE BACKING LABOUR'S PLAN FOR A BETTER FUTURE

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour pledges a strong economic foundation.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Higher living standards for working families
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour aims to deliver higher living standards for working families.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: An NHS with the time to care
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour is proposing plans for an NHS with the time to care.
Labour intends to implement controls on immigration.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A country where the next generation can do better than the last
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour wants to ensure that the next generation can do better than the last.

issues.governance: Only Labour will deliver a recovery which reaches working people across Britain, and build an NHS with the time to care.
issues.health: Labour plans for 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs.
issues.immigration: Controls on immigration are one of Labour's pledges.

housing.content: Labour's plan includes clamping down on tax avoidance and taxing properties worth over £2m.

endorsements.endorsement: Backing Labour's plan for 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs.
Backing Labour's plan for 25 hours of free childcare for working parents.
Backing Labour's plan to cut tuition fees and raise maintenance grants for students.

quotes.text: None of our manifesto commitments requires additional borrowing. We will cut the deficit every year while securing the future of our NHS.

images.caption: Campaign pledges and testimonials from supporters.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet promotes Labour's plan for a better future and makes specific pledges to the electorate.
